portfolio_balance.note: Quick Mode: All 6 unique papers ranked. No standards documents found (expected for Google Scholar-only search).

quality_assessment.note: Quick Mode search via Google Scholar resulted in limited citation data and mixed publication quality. Recommend expanding to ACM/IEEE for higher quality sources in full mode.

suggestions: All 6 unique papers show strong relevance to research question (avg 84/100).
Consider expanding search to ACM Digital Library and IEEE Xplore for peer-reviewed conference/journal papers.
Greene (2020) dissertation provides solid framework foundation despite older date.
Whitcombe (2026) and Peerzada (2025) offer most recent perspectives on DevOps governance.
No standards documents found - consider manual addition of ISO/IEC 38500, COBIT, ITIL if needed.

notes: Deduplication applied: 15 input candidates reduced to 6 unique papers.
Quick Mode scoring emphasizes Relevance (40%) and Recency (30%) over Quality.
All papers meet minimum year threshold (2019+).
Portfolio skewed toward primary research and management papers - no standards found in Google Scholar results.
